body.name: IFWAETR USB Camera 4K Webcam with2.8-12mm 4X Optical Zoom Lens 2160P OpenCV Camera Close up Zoom in and Out Web Camera with Microphone Conference Camera for Computer,Laptop Jetson Nano,Raspberry Pi
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 20 hrs 4 mins
features: 2.8-12mm 4X Manual Zoom Lens:4k usb camera with 2.8-12mm manual varifocal lens. It's manual focus, which gives you the control to zoom in and out, focus and adjust aperture size, to give brightness to your subject and you can lock those in place with the aid of some screws on the lens.This camera debugging is very professional, different shooting angle will produce different results.

4K Ultra HD Resolution: 4K USB camera high definition with HDR technology, 2160P pc usb webcam with Advanced Sony (1/2.8'' ) IMX415 image sensor, features up to a 3840x2160 resolution at 30fps. Added IR-cut filter(650nm) for great color presentation.

Standard 1/4 Inch Screw Mount: 4K zoom webcam with solid aluminum case, 1/4 inch screw hole at the bottom can fit regular tripod mount or webcam stand,clip and holders, easier for more applications. Built-in microphone for streaming or video conference,picking up your voice clearly.

Wide Application:4k usb camera it is a close up or monitoring camera for an industrial application,close inspection,embedded system,close up or monitoring camera for an industrial application,variable focus USB camera to record bird feeding the bird feeder,keep the recording in loop,especially getting a satisfactory long distance focus outdoors.

Plug and Play&UVC Compliant: This 2160P usb webcam is very easy to set and without any complex driver install. Wide Compatibility for Third-party software and operation systems: Compatible with Skype, MSN, Facebook, Youtube Live Streaming etc instant messaging applications. Fits for multi-operations including Windows xp / 7/8/10, OS X and Linux or Android.

IFWATER Ultra HD 4K USB Camera 4X Manual Optical Zoom Camera With IMX415 Sensor,2.8-12mm Varifocal Lens Web Camera,Plug& Play Video Conference Camera IFWATER 4K UHD USB Camera With Zoom 2.8-12mm 4X Optical Zoom Lens USB Webcam Sony IMX415 Sensor Camera 3840x2160@30fps Manual Focus Audio Camera Note: 1.The maximum resolution of some software or screens only supports 1080P or 720P, In order to enjoy Ultra clear 4K 8 megapixels image or video of this webcam, Please make sure your software and screen support 4K. 2. For desktop, it is recommended that customers use the USB interface on the back of the computer, the stability will be better. 3.If you are unable to access Windows 10's preinstalled Skype with this 4K webcam, please go to the Skype official website to download the desktop version. 3. Make sure that you plug the webcam directly into your computer, NOT a USB hub. USB hubs are often too underpowered to operate a webcam. 4.4K zoom usb camera built in stereo microphone, but with box housing, the microphone effect is not very good. 4K HD webcam built in stereo mic with automatic noise reduction makes the sound purer and clearer. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Terrible picture quality.
reviews.reviewText: No way is this 4K unless it’s upscaled. It has a very narrow depth of focus and the lens controls are hypersensitive. Normally you zoom in, focus, then zoom out. But that doesn’t work with this lens. Only a small part of any shot will ever be in focus, but only a soft focus at that. Disappointing even for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great add on usb camera to watch my 3D printer.
reviews.reviewText: This is a good usb camera that I was able to install and add on to my 3D printer so I could watch it. All I took was a longer usb cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Robust camera, decent lens, overly sensitive adjustment
reviews.reviewText: It's a good camera but the difference in adjustment from where you want it to unusable image is only a hair away. It can be adjusted but it seems ideally suited to fixed location use and not a variable location.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4K, Looks Good, Has about 0.5-1s latency
reviews.reviewText: Overall I am a fan of the camera, but I would make sure it fits your use case best -It's a relatively small 4k Camera that works pretty well in mid-light, but I strongly recommend using it with a good amount of light, and definitely wouldn't recommend use in low-light.The latency of about 0.5s-1s shouldn't be a problem for most (I noticed this in OBS, so other software may vary), but if you wanted to try and use this for something like live-streaming, do keep this in mind.The lens itself was easy to adjust and use, and the locks to ensure no more rotation felt secure.
